metadata.name: LOUSY! & A.SOCIETY #1
metadata.description:
Luxury eyewear label, A.SOCIETY has partnered with artist, LOUSY!, to create a collection of 5,000 uniquely generated NFT frames that extends from just digital assets on the blockchain to include 250 ‘phygital’ (physical + digital) twins.
      
The blurring between physical and digital realities, defined by the unmistakable creative vision by WEAR, sets a new standard for the future of luxury retail. Experience the progressive evolution of fashion-meets-technology-meets-art.
